import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./PaymentPage.css"; const PaymentPage = () => { // ... (keep all your existing state and logic) return (
{/* Payment Header */}

Complete Your Payment

Secure Payment
{loading ? (

Processing your payment...

Please don't close this window

) : success ? (

Payment Successful!

Your transaction has been completed successfully.

) : (
{/* Card Payment Section */}

Credit/Debit Card

setCardNumber(e.target.value)} placeholder="1234 5678 9012 3456" maxLength="16" className="card-input" />
setExpiryDate(e.target.value)} placeholder="MM/YYYY" maxLength="7" />
setCvv(e.target.value)} placeholder="123" maxLength="4" />
{/* Divider */}
OR
{/* Upload Proof Section */}

Upload Payment Proof

{paymentProof && ( )}

Supported formats: JPG, PNG (Max 5MB)

{/* Submit Button */} {/* Error Message */} {error && (
{error}
)}
)}
); }; export default PaymentPage;
